name: Flight Rising: Swipp & Baldwin Item Counts
description: Shows how much of each item is needed for Swipp trades and Baldwin recipes.
additional_info: I use it alongside the highlighting style Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp & Baldwin Items by OnyxWalksalone. EDIT: Added edits suggested by milary. Thank you! 6-19-2016: - Added vistas and other minor updates.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://flightrising.com/main.php?p=hoard"), url-prefix("http://flightrising.com/main.php?p=vault"), url-prefix("http://flightrising.com/main.php?p=ah"), url-prefix("http://www1.flightrising.com/forums/"), url-prefix("http://flightrising.com/main.php?p=market&"), url-prefix("http://flightrising.com/main.php?p=wiki") {
a.intclue,a.clue{display:inline-block; position:relative; text-align:left;}


a.intclue:before,a.clue:before,
a.intclue:after,a.clue:after{
    background:rgba(254, 254, 254, 0.8); 
    border:1px solid #fff;
    box-sizing:border-box;
    color:black; 
    font-family:Calibri,Candara,Segoe,Segoe UI,Optima,Arial,sans-serif;
    line-height:1em; 
    position:absolute; 
    right:0;
}

    
a.intclue:before,a.clue:before{font-weight:bold; padding:0 1px; text-align:right; top:0; white-space:pre;}
a.intclue:after,a.clue:after{bottom:0; left:0; padding:0; white-space:pre-wrap;}

a.intclue:hover:before,a.clue:hover:before,
a.intclue:hover:after,a.clue:hover:after{background:rgba(254, 254, 254, 0.99);}

a.intclue:before{opacity:0.3;}
a.intclue:hover:before{opacity:1;}
